eventDecorators.name: MisoInitTokenFactory
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when first initializing Miso Token Factory.

eventDecorators.name: TokenCreated
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a token is created using template id.

eventDecorators.name: TokenTemplateAdded
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a token template is added.

eventDecorators.name: TokenTemplateRemoved
eventDecorators.description: event emitted when a token template is removed.

functionDecorators.name: accessControls
functionDecorators.description: Responsible for access rights to the contract.

functionDecorators.name: addTokenTemplate
functionDecorators.description: Function to add a token template to create through factoryShould have operator access.

parameterDecorators.name: _template
parameterDecorators.description: Token template to create a token.

functionDecorators.name: createToken
functionDecorators.description: Creates a token corresponding to template idInitializes token with parameters passed.

parameterDecorators.name: _templateId
parameterDecorators.description: Template id of token to create.

functionDecorators.name: getTemplateId
functionDecorators.description: Get the total number of tokens in the factory.

functionDecorators.name: getTokenTemplate
functionDecorators.description: Get the address of the token template.

functionDecorators.name: initMISOTokenFactory
functionDecorators.description: Single gateway to initialize the MISO Token Factory with proper addressCan only be initialized once.

functionDecorators.name: isChildToken
functionDecorators.description: Tracks if a token is made by the factory.

functionDecorators.name: numberOfTokens
functionDecorators.description: Get the total number of tokens in the factory.

functionDecorators.name: removeTokenTemplate
functionDecorators.description: Function to remove a token templateShould have operator access.

parameterDecorators.name: _templateId
parameterDecorators.description: Refers to template that is to be deleted.

functionDecorators.name: tokenTemplateId
functionDecorators.description: Template id to track respective token template.
